   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to equations's documentation!
=====================================

The library for solving equations.

.. note::
    
    The ``equations`` library currently can only solve 
    quadratic equations.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   api
